title: Silver
description: Briony thought she knew all about Wicked and its dangerous woods. What she didn't expect wasthat there were more than creatures who go bump in the night, more than creatures the Preservation Society have to watch out for. Aunt Sophie, Pietre, and all the residents of Wicked Woods have been waiting for this moment...a moment that would change Briony forever.
author: Kailin Gow
